summary: The bow version of Mehrunes' Razor.
descriptionHtml:
It sort of sucked that you could only have a dagger version of the Mehrunes' Razor which was in turn, limited to melee. I decided to make a ranged version of the Daedric Artifact in the form of a bow. This is my first mod and is fairly simple, my future mods will probably be more advanced.
[u]
Requirements:[/u]
Skyrim
(Does not require SkyUI, SKSE or any DLCs)
[u]
Workshop Link[/u]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=303453247]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=303453247[/url]
[u]
FAQ:[/u]
[b]
What does it do?[/b]
Same thing as the vanilla Mehrunes' Razor but as a bow.
[b]
What's this Mehrunes' Razor you're talking about?[/b]
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Mehrunes'_Razor_(Skyrim)]Click here to find out [/url] (Contains some spoilers to a side quest)
[b]
[/b][b]What's the crafting recipe?[/b]
1 Daedra Heart
3 Ebony Ingot
1 Pommel Stone of Mehrune's Bow

[b]How do I get the Pommel Stone of Mehrune's Bow?[/b]
Craft it at a forge, requires:
1 Daedra Heart
1 Ebony Ingot
1 Flawless Diamond

[b]Why can't I craft that stuff?[/b]
Daedric smithing is required.

[b]What is the improvement item?[/b]
1 Ebony Ingot
[b]
What are the stats?[/b]
Same as a Daedric Bow but has a special enchantment and is 1.72 times worth it's regular counterpart, just like the Mehrunes' Razor in comparison to a Daedric Dagger.
[b]
Are there any mod incompatibilities or bugs?[/b]
None that I know of, if you encounter any let me know.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]
Suggest any ideas you have in the comments and remember to Rate Up and favorite![/b]
[u]


Extra Tags[/u]
Mehrunes Bow
Mehrunes Dagon
Mehrune's Bow
author: CyanPancake
